title.rendered: Member Update: Libertex To Sponsor Tottenham Hotspur Football Club

content.rendered:
Our approved broker member Libertex has revealed a new sports sponsorship agreement, this time with famous UK football club Tottenham Hotspur, according to Finance Magnates. This is the broker’s second foray into sports sponsorships, having already inked a deal with Spain’s Valencia CF last year.

According to Finance Magnates, Tottenham Hotspur is one of the top football clubs in London and won multiple titles in both domestic and international series. Many well-known football players from around the world are also playing for this club. Marios Chailis, the brokerage’s chief marketing officer, commented to Finance Magnates: “Libertex could not be happier to partner with a team whose values echo our own so perfectly,”

The foray into sports sponsorships is not new for many Forex and CFD brokers, as companies like Plus550, Swissquote, FXPRo, GAIN Capital, eToro, and others have struck partnerships with automobile racing, football, and even sailing clubs to promote online trading and sports activities.
